description: Group assignment involving written answers to theoretical questions and implementation of a computer program to solve a concrete linear algebra problem. Includes submission of source files and PDF documentation.
Three individual quizzes reinforcing key lecture concepts and linear algebra revision, completed over weeks 1-6 with immediate feedback provided.
2-hour individual final exam assessing all course topics through problem-solving questions similar to tutorial problems, conducted during official examination period.
45-minute individual class test assessing knowledge of weeks 1-5 content through tutorial-style questions, typically held in Week 7.
